summary: The exchange is raising “a couple hundred million,” said the parent company’s chairman, Changpeng Zhao.
title: Binance US to Close Pre-IPO Funding in 1-2 Months
content: Binance US will be closing a pre-IPO funding round in the next one to two months, the founder and CEO of the exchange’s parent company, Changpeng “CZ” Zhao, said at the Bloomberg New Economy Forum in Singapore on Nov. 19.
Read more: Binance.US Could Go Public in 3 Years, CEO Zhao Says: Report
